Hi! Whether you're a seasoned traveler or just embarking on your first adventure, I'm thrilled to have you join me on this journey through Riya's Travel Diary! Together, we'll explore breathtaking destinations, uncover hidden gems, and share unforgettable experiences.

My most recent trip to Bali, Indonesia in December 2023!
